Key Arguments: The legislation excludes government and preferred news outlets from being held accountable for misinformation/disinformation.
The definition of misinformation/disinformation is not clearly stated and is open to interpretation.
The legislation could lead to censorship of freedom of speech and expression if it doesn't align with government views.
Main Themes: Lack of accountability for government and media
Notable Quotes: I oppose any form of censorship in Australia so I don’t support this legislation.
Freedom of speech and expression could be censored as it doesn't fit with the government’s rhetoric of the day.
